original_text: When they were going to that place, they met a man called Simon. He came from the city of Cyrene. The Roman soldiers told Simon that he must carry Jesus' cross.
korean_text: 나가다가 시몬이란 구레네 사람을 만나매 그에게 예수의 십자가를 억지로 지워 가게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: When they were going to that place
they met a man called Simon
He came from the city of Cyrene
that he must carry Jesus' cross
